Nightlight:

Nightlitht saw scared how Burning hammer was walking towards the 
base, how several bots was yelling and fighthing.After she close 
base's door, she ran where Aerotaur was.

"NIGHTLIGHT COME IN BASE" Screamed Windlord "THIS ISN'T A SAFE PLACE 
COME BACK THE BASE"

Nightlight didn't come back, Windlord screamed "PERPLEX TAKE HER AND 
COME BACK THE BASE... BOTH" 

Windlord screamed to BH "Are you ready to fight??? "
